name: Technical Documentation (Article 11)
description: Comprehensive technical documentation template for high-risk AI systems per Article 11 and Annex IV requirements

sections.title: 1. General Description of the AI System
2. Description of System Elements and Development Process
3. Monitoring, Functioning and Control
4. Risk Management Documentation
5. Validation and Testing
6. EU Declaration of Conformity Information

variables.name: intendedUse
variables.description: Detailed description of intended use cases

variables.name: systemType
variables.description: Type of AI system (ML, deep learning, etc.)

name: Instructions for Use Template
description: User instructions template for high-risk AI systems per Article 13 transparency requirements

sections.title: 1. Provider Information
2. System Characteristics and Capabilities
3. Installation and Operating Conditions
4. Human Oversight Requirements
5. Maintenance and Support

variables.name: providerName
variables.description: Legal name of the AI system provider

name: Risk Management Documentation
description: Risk management documentation template per Article 9 requirements

sections.title: 1. Risk Management System Overview
2. Risk Identification and Analysis
3. Risk Evaluation and Assessment
4. Risk Mitigation Measures
5. Residual Risk Assessment

name: EU Declaration of Conformity
description: EU Declaration of Conformity template for high-risk AI systems

sections.title: Declaration of Conformity
Applicable Requirements
Conformity Assessment Procedure
Additional Information

variables.name: applicableRequirements
variables.description: List of applicable AI Act requirements

name: GPAI Model Documentation
description: General Purpose AI model documentation and model card template

sections.title: 1. Model Overview
2. Training Data Summary
3. Model Training and Evaluation
4. Systemic Risk Assessment
5. Model Deployment and Monitoring

name: Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment
description: Fundamental rights impact assessment template for AI system deployers

sections.title: 1. Assessment Overview
2. Fundamental Rights Analysis
3. Stakeholder Consultation
4. Risk Assessment and Mitigation
5. Conclusions and Recommendations

variables.name: deployerName
variables.description: Name of the AI system deployer

variables.name: assessorName
variables.description: Name of the person conducting the assessment

variables.name: assessmentScope
variables.description: Scope and boundaries of the assessment
